Pops a virus warning on AVG.  .  Game installs, Directs browser to russian website.  Unless you know Russian, I'd go with Skidrow
There's any chance of a english translation?

I get how to change to english hehe...

Go to the execute on start menu(I guess that's execute in english windows, 'cause mine is in portuguese =P) and type regedit.

Find the RERC registration, then open the "locale" item.

Change the number to 1033.

It works for me at last =)
